hello there! I wanted to double check if I can use redirect links to promote brands who work with us (we run their affiliate programs)

Hi there! When it comes to using redirect links for promoting brands, it's important to ensure that your practices align with our advertising policies. We have specific guidelines to maintain a high-quality advertising environment. I recommend reviewing our ad policy compliance document for detailed information on what is allowed. If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to reach out!
can you give me a link to the advertising policies?

Sure thing! You can review our advertising policies and guidelines by visiting this link: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any questions, feel free to ask!
